ygData.subject: Re: True Colours
ygData.msgSnippet: Finally someone matched my Iron Fist post for stupidity and rule breaking (if that s possible either way I don t look like quite as big an idiot now do I).

Finally someone matched my "Iron Fist" post for
stupidity and rule breaking (if that's possible either
way I don't look like quite as big an idiot now do I).

--- "rAuq (rauq@...)" <x_rauq_x@...>
wrote:
> Well... another unexpected turn of events. A few
> things to consider: (1) Since you're using a timed
> mine, you must wait till the timer runs out for the
> explosion. That would mean that Azureblade could
> probably deavtivate the CR chamber (if that's
> possible) and try to run (unless he's a demolition
> expert). Also if that's possible, then he can
> probably warn other maximals in the base. (2) The
> explosion won't necessarily destroy the whole base;
> note that you are using a mine. It'll most likely
> cripple the majority of the interior, or blow out a
> large hole in the side, depending on where the CR
> chambers are. (3) The internal scanners of the
> Maximal base would likely detect either the
> explosives themselves, or the electrical signal of
> the timer and therefore hint to the Maxi's that
> something is going on.
> 
> Since you know that this post is highly illegal, are
> you asking us to disallow it? Not that is
> necessarily is, it just that you rushed it too much,
> the timer must be taken into account.
> 
> Just pause the thought while the council has a short
> discussion about it.
> 
> Council members, visit the nbwrpg site, and check
> the coucil message board.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Michael Coburn"
> <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> > ::Symphony/Hell Drak::
> > 
> > Symphony nodded, and said, "Yes, I'll take care of
> him."
> > 
> > Symphony looked in at AzureBlade.
> > 
> > "I'm sorry......" Symphony said, as he deactivated
> the CR Chamber.
> > 
> > Symphony left the room.  He put a timed mine on
> the CR Chamber containing AzureBlade, set to
> detonate in 5 minutes.  Symphony left the room, and
> went to the control room.  He pressed the
> self-destruct button...
> > 
> > OOC:  Ok, I know this post is probably highly
> illegal, but if it's not, could somebody please post
> for Maximal City and the whole self-destruct thing?
> 
>
